speech:
Shangi


-Highly prolific, versatile use
-About 1m high, upright growth
-Broad leaves, light in colour
-Abundant flowers,
-Oval tubers, uniform in grading, white flesh
-Medium to deep eye with pink pigmentation
-Very short dormancy
-Matures in 3-4 months
-Yield 30,000-40,000kg per acre
-Moderately susceptible to late blight
-Good for mashing, boiling, Roasting,chips
-Altitude range 1500-2800m asl
Released varieties (2010 by KARI-Tigoni)
